LanguageData.PodLauncherMKTwo.label: Pod Launcher MK2
LanguageData.PodLauncherMKTwo.description: Advanced pod launcher with enough fuel capacity to reach the entire planet.
LanguageData.TransportPodMKTwo.label: Transport Pod MK2
LanguageData.TransportPodMKTwo.description: A heavy duty launchable sub-orbital cargo pod. Can be used for sending gifts, transporting people or supplies, surprise attacks, or reinforcing battles.
